com.quinsoft.zeidon.domains

Class DoubleDomain

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.quinsoft.zeidon.domains.AbstractDomain
      • com.quinsoft.zeidon.domains.AbstractNumericDomain
        • com.quinsoft.zeidon.domains.DoubleDomain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Domain

    public class DoubleDomain
extends AbstractNumericDomain
    Decimal domain, which stores values as Double. Uses DecimalFormat for formatting values to string. See http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/i18n/format/decimalFormat.html
    Author:
    DG
